transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, haan ji. Good evening sir.
Executive: Aap kaun bol rahi hai?
Customer: Aap kis company se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Main RV solution se baat kar raha hun. Ye Jai Maa Matravasini Bhandar.
Customer: Kahan se sir?
Executive: Jai Maa Matravasini Bhandar.
Customer: Ji ji sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hun.
Executive: Ye customer care ka number hai na?
Customer: Haan haan sir.
Executive: Mere manager ka number nahi hai na?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi. Customer care ke number pe lagaya tha. 9696 pe sir.
Customer: Ji ji. Mujhe actually ek complaint dalna tha.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Complaint ke liye ya fir aapka thoda advice chahiye.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Abhi jaise ki maine ek lead use kiya tha. Hyderabad ke ek client mila tha. Unko kuch texture designing karwani thi wall pe, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To unhone karwani hai sir?
Customer: Texture designing ka kaam tha.
Executive: Okay okay haan.
Customer: Uske liye maine lead liya tha aur fir unko contact kiya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To wo bole ki aake dekh lijiye site. Main site pe jaake dekh liya, visit kar liya aur unko rate vagera sab bata diya.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Do teen din ke baad wo do teen din ke baad wo final kar diye ki haan theek hai, aap aake start kar sakte hain. To maine advance ke liye pucha. Ki advance payment de dijiye thoda to kaam start karenge, material vagera lenge. To bole nahi aisa nahi ho payega. Hum log first time kaam kar rahe hain. Dusre log ko bhi aise payment kar diye the advance, wo leke bhag gaya. To aap pehle thoda kaam kar dijiye fir aapko advance payment mil jayega. Theek hai, wo thoda government project hai karke bol rahe the. Ki army defense ka ek guest house, guest house ban raha hai. Usme hi ye kaam hai to ye defense defense hai usme to aap pehle thoda kar dikha dijiye kaam fir aapko milega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Chalo theek hai, kar denge. To fir maine kaam start kar diya aur ek do teen din ka kaam tha, chota kaam tha, jyada bada kaam tha nahi. Total amount kareeb 70,000 ke aas pass tha. Total amount tha, theek hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Jisme unhone first day to pura din gujar gaya, payment kuch bhi diya nahi. Fir maine bola sir aap bole the payment kar denge dopahar tak. Wo nahi to theek hai abhi tak abhi 10,000 main de raha hun. Aap idhar de do pehle bola. Unhone bola ki 70,000 ka kaam hai aap 5,000 advance de rahe hain. 10,000 ka to maine material ke hi lekar aa gaya hun. Theek hai? To material ka to mujhe paisa kaun dega aur fir advance kya denge aap? To fir usme 10,000 diya us time pe.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Okay, haan.
Customer: Uske baad fir bola ki main bola tha ki 50% advance chahiye. Uske baad fir baki khatam ho jayega kaam fir aap de dijiyega. To abhi 10,000 aapko de raha hun fir baki aap kal morning le lijiyega. Kal morning jaake kaam start kar diya. Payment thode der mein karwa deta hun, thode der mein karwa deta hun. Karke pura din nikal gaya. Main pura din bhi baitha tha main dikha sakta main kaam kar diya. Dusre din bhi kaam ho gaya overall kaam khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Abhi last evening mein main payment ke liye pucha ki wahi payment aap bole the subah hi karenge. Abhi tak aap payment nahi diye hain to main client verify nahi kar raha hai abhi. Client aake dekhega, baat karega uske baad aapko kal subah mein aap le lijiye. Theek hai? Fir maine ab kya karenge jabardasti ladai to nahi karenge to fir main bola chal theek hai subah de dijiyega. Fir thoda kaam pending tha do laake subah aake aap isko khatam kar dijiye aap full payment le lijiyega. Fir main subah jaake thoda bahut jo bhi kaam baki tha wo pura kaam khatam kar diya aur payment ke liye pura din beet gaya fir. Matlab pura din lag gaya fir wo payment ke liye pucha to bol raha hai abhi client okay nahi kiya hai. Client aake dekhega to fir aapko payment milega. Abhi main aapko 10 10 15,000 ke dal deta hun. To fir 10 15,000 to usne diya matlab total 25,000 mujhe mila. Theek hai? Abhi kareeb abhi kareeb 40 45,000 mera aur baki hai nikal raha hai. Ab wo ab wo party kya bol raha hai ki client ko pasand nahi aaya kaam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Haan, client ko kaam pasand nahi aa raha hai. Main bola ki client se mera koi lena dena nahi hai. Theek hai? Client wale ko client jo hai usko usne Asian Paint wale ko contract diya hai bolke. Theek hai? Isne usko bataya ki Asian Paint se kaam karwaunga. Main Asian Paint ka nahi hun, main third person hun.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan haan sir. Usne sasta usne sasta bolke mere se kaam karwa liya. Theek hai? Abhi kaam pura ho gaya, kaam khatam ho gaya ab wo client ko pasand nahi aa raha hai ya fir wo kya wajah se wo deny kar raha hai wo malum nahi hai, theek hai? Abhi wo kuch bhi na to mera phone receive kar raha hai, na to mera wo kuch jawab de raha hai, na paisa de raha hai. Na payment diya. Abhi aaj ki char din ho gaya kaam khatam karke. Theek hai? Ab aise mein main kya karu ye jo client hai uska detail main aapko batata hun. Haan. Theek hai? Aap ek bar note kijiye wo registered member hai aapka IndiaMART mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap ek kaam kariye client ka na aap naam number aur bhi jo bhi information ho unki company ka naam jo bhi aapke screenshot vagera kuch bhi ho sir, theek hai? Aap wo sari cheeze aapke jo account manager hain unko bhejiye. Wo wahan se na ek buyer supply ka ticket raise hota hai sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To hum wo raise karenge yahan se fir. Agar aap mujhe uska number bataye client ka.
Customer: To abhi kaise client ka number dun aapko?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Dekhiye us client ka jo profile name yahan dikh raha hai mujhe wo Sunil Singh ke naam se. Unka company ka naam hai K Line Project, Hyderabad, Telangana. Address hai uska flat number 302, tower 2. Imami nahi aap mujhe ek bar number bataiye ya fir company ka name main dekhu ki is is naam se hamare paas company hai kya?
Executive: Company ka naam hai K Line Project.
Customer: K Line. Company ka naam K Line Project. GST number hai uska 3688 QFK2283. Ek minute sir. Ek minute GST number kya hai? 3688 QF K2283H2ZZ.
Executive: Double Z yes.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sunil Singh naam ke ye buyer hain K Line se hain.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ji Line Project ka iska.
Executive: Theek.
Executive: Abhi hume na aap ek bar inka number bhej dijiye. Theek hai?
Customer: Iska number hai 98. Screenshot bhi aap mujhe bhej dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, screenshot bhi bhej deta hun. Kisko bhej du main mere manager ko?
Customer: Haan haan sir, unko hi sara bhejna hai kyunki ultimately na main bhul gaya hun uska naam Kashish Gupta. Kashish.
Executive: Kashish Gupta, theek hai theek hai haan. Kashish Gupta ji aap unko bhejiye fir wo yahan pe ticket raise karti hain us buyer ke liye aur wo ek bar khud bhi baat karenge buyer se.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir aur isliye main iske liye complaint karne soch raha hun ki mujhe paisa to chahiye na abhi ye char panch din main jaake kaam kiya hun pura pura din aur material bhi main yahi apne paise se.
Customer: Aapne jab aapke samne kaam kiya to wahan aapko ye buyer samne nahi mila kya face to face?
Customer: Iska ek supervisor tha. Uska ek supervisor tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Wo uske through kaam ho raha tha wahan pe. Wo supervisor pura din wahan pe rukta hai, dekhta hai kya hai nahi hai. Plus ye jo client tha ek din aaya tha site pe aake dekh ke gaya. Us time pe abhi jaise teen room mein design karna tha plus ek hall mein design karna tha. To main jab first room mein design kiya us time hi bol deta na ki haan party ko pasand nahi aa raha hai. Chahe hum party ko pehle dikhwa lenge. Tab tak aap ruk jaiye chahe hold kar lijiye. Pura kaam ho gaya full final everything khatam ho gaya. Ab wo usko bol raha hai wo client ko pasand nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Samajh gayi.
Customer: Theek hai? To ye koi ye to ye to fraud karne ka ek seedha seedha upay hai. Bilkul sir aapne sahi kaha hai aapne. Haan. Haan. Ab main ek to main apne cost mein bhi kam karke usko rate laga ke ki chalo theek hai kar lenge do teen din ka kaam hai kar lenge. Ab main to apna hisab se kaam karke jo bhi mera genuine bhi rate laga ke kaam kar raha tha ki mujhe itna milega. Ab wo mujhe milega kya wo to main samajh lo ki bas char din wahan panch din jo bhi kaam kiya wo bas aise hi kuch bhi nahi uska. To aise sir aap hume number bhejiye sara hum baat karte hain aur hamari jo buyer supply team hoti hai na, theek hai? Hum detail sari unko bhejenge wo hamari ek legal team hai sir, theek hai? To court vagera ke sara matter wahi dekhti hai. Jo bhi legal cases hote hain to wo sare hamari wahi team dekhti hai. To main ek concern raise karti hun apne us department ko aur fir dekhte hain kya solution aata hai baki number pe hum khud baat karte hain ek bar buyer se.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir. Iska solution to nikalna hi padega kyunki main aise to chod nahi sakta hun. 40 45,000.
Customer: Haan bilkul sir aapke paise lage hain wahan pe. Aapka pending hai abhi wahan pe aapka 55,000 pending hai aapka wahan pe. To aise to nahi chodna hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ji to aap number vagera bhejiye hume. Haan Kashish ko bhejiye fir hum solution nikalte hain uska sir.
Customer: Aapka kya naam hai?
Executive: Sir actually aapne jo call kiya hai na wo customer care se mere paas hi call aata hai sir. Kashish naam mera hi hai but aapne starting mein pucha ki mere account manager to nahi hai. Haan aapne starting mein pucha ki mere account manager to nahi hai to maine bola nahi maine mujhe laga shayad meri complaint karni hogi to. Sir kya hota hai na ki aap kahin bhi call kare na IndiaMART pe wo call hamare paas hi aayega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Agar mujhse koi problem kya? To aapko malum thi hai na ki main hi bol rahi hun. Mujhe laga ki koi aur phone uthai koi bhi aise matlab nahi aapne starting mein pucha na ki jo mere account manager hain unka to naam bhul gaya tha actually main aapka number search save kiya hua Kashish Gupta ke naam se. Main IndiaMART ke naam se search kar raha hun lekin naam mera naam aapka naam mere mind se nikal gaya tha. To main aapko phone pehle aapko hi lagane wala tha. Theek hai? Aur itne sare number hai phone mein isliye mujhe laga shayad koi meri complaint hogi to maine kaha ek bar sun leti hun. Nahi nahi aapki complaint kyun karunga aap se koi lena dena nahi hai. Beech beech mein aap call karti hui rehti hain aur jo bhi solution hota hai batana rehta hai karti hain. Kyun aapne bhi customer care pe call kiya na to ye puri recording line hai sir to ye sunte bhi hain hamare manager pura to fir maine kaha ki meri koi galti na ho isme isliye. Haan meri aapki koi galti nahi hai theek hai aapko detail mein send karta hun. Sir aap aap number bhejiye hum call karte hain buyer ko aur hamari jo legal team hoti hai main unko bhi sab bhejti hun sir yahan se. Abhi do teen din pehle hi to phone ki thi aapne. Haan sir hamari baat hui thi 25 ko baat hui thi hamari October mein. Haan haan haan ji. Theek hai main aapko detail bhejta hun is par thoda aap haan main aapko hi message kiya hai WhatsApp mein aap mujhe bhejiye sir. Main baat karti hun buyer se ek bar aur wahan bhi raise karke concern. kar lijiye aur jaisa bhi ho iska solution nikaliye nahi to agle ko bol dijiye ki fir aapke naam se complaint registered hoga police station mein hoga seedha baat. Bilkul sir hoga hi sir haan. Kyunki hum log koi hum fraud work karne ja rahe hain ki jhoot muth ka kaam paisa le liya aur bhag gaya aisa kaam nahi hai. Genuine kaam kar rahe hain. fraud kaam karna hi kyun hai sir? Aaj usne aapke sath fraud kiya 70,000 ka kal kisi aur ke sath to uske sath bhi aisa hai wahan pe jo last time mein evening mein raat mein nikla hun 9 baje tak main wait kiya hun payment ke liye wo na to client ka pata hai na to supervisor ka pata hai last mein jo guard rehte hain wahan pe pura army campus hai wo theek hai? Pura army campus hai pura force ka log bhara pada hai. Wahan pe jo security guard rehte hain main gate pe wo log kya bol rahe the are bhaiya aap kya bolenge yahan pe jitne log kaam karne aa rahe hain na wo sabka aisa hi hai sab koi ro ro kar hi ja raha hai sabka paisa mar hi raha hai aisa hi kar raha hai ye log. Pata nahi kya hai. Nahi to banti hai sir baki hum bhi dekhte hain sir hamari jo bhi best possible hoga sir. main aap aaj se kal tak mujhe iska detail final bata dijiye. Haan abhi aapne evening mein call kiya to abhi to hum raise karenge wahan pe concern to shayad kal hi call kare buyer ko. Haan theek hai koi baat nahi kal aap kar dijiye. call kar lenge sham ko call kar lenge abhi. Kal kal kam se kam 15 20 bar phone kiya hun nahi uthaya aaj bhi subah se main kal hi 15 20 bar phone kar diya nahi uthaya. Message bhi kar raha hun whatsapp message bhi kar raha hun koi response nahi de raha hai. To lastly fir uske wahi hua ki main jaake uske area mein jo bhi hai wahan pe jaake police complaint dal dunga. Haan sir aapke paas right hai aap kar sakte hain aap trusted supplier hain hamare aap bhejiye hume sara hum yahan par raise karte hain concern sir. Theek hai theek hai thank you. Okay sir haan ji bhejiye sir. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received full payment.

- Client is claiming dissatisfaction with the work.

- Client is not responding to calls or messages.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to send details of the client.

- Executive assured that a ticket will be raised.

- Executive assured that legal team will investigate.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details to Kashish Gupta.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, fraud, complaint, buyleads, legal
